locale.name: en_US
locale.message: ALM Eklentisi
Plugin to display in Article Level Metrics. To use the ALM service, you need to have use DOIs. This requirement may be relaxed in the future.
Madde Ölçümleri
Ölçüm Çağırılıyor ...
Ayarlar
ALM eklentisi ayarları kaydedildi.
Makale düzeyi ölçüm uygulama arayüzü API anahtarı
To be able to access the article level metrics from ALM server, you need an API key. You can create one by login in (using Mozilla Persona) on the PKP ALM page.
Automatically deposit articles information? (Uncheck if you deposit the information direclty on ALM server using the DOI prefix.)
Makale bilgisi arşiv URL'si
Arşivlenen makaleler için PKP tarafından sağlanan URL
When contacting PKP to set up the ALM service, please provide this IP address: {$ip}
Bu Dergi
HTML Görüntüleme
Total number of HTML page views for this article. These views are recorded directly within the system itself. Overall monthly view counts may also be available.
PDF Görüntüleme.
Total number of PDF views and downloads for this article. These views are recorded directly within the system itself. Overall monthly view counts may also be available.
Paylaşımlar
Shares or bookmarks in social networks such as Facebook, CiteULike and Mendeley. In most cases, clicking on the number of shares will take you to a listing in the network itself.
Beğeniler
Facebook gibi sosyal ağlarda bulunan beğeniler.
Atıflar
Citations of this article found in CrossRef, PubMed and Wikipedia. In most cases, clicking on the citation count will take you to a listing in the referencing service itself.
ALM plugin is enabled but a valid DOI prefix must be specified in the journal path {$path} Setup in order to send article information.
ALM plugin is enabled but no API key defined for journal path {$path}.
ALM eklentisi herhangi bir dergide etkinleştirilmedi. Herhangi bir makale bilgisi gönderilmedi.
Could not confirm that article information for journal path {$path} is sent. Server did not respond.
Herhangi bir arşiv URL'si belirlenmedi.
ALM makale bilgi göndericisi
